mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_news ( title, content, image_urls, author_name, publisher_id, publish_time, update_time, read_count, tags, is_deleted ) VALUES ( #{title}, #{content}, #{imageUrls}, #{authorName}, #{publisherId}, #{publishTime}, #{updateTime}, #{readCount}, #{tags}, #{isDeleted} )
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_news SET read_count = read_count + 1 WHERE news_id = #{newsId} AND is_deleted = 0

UPDATE tb_news SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, image_urls = #{imageUrls}, author_name = #{authorName}, tags = #{tags}, update_time = #{updateTime} WHERE news_id = #{newsId} AND is_deleted = 0
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM tb_news WHERE is_deleted = 0 ORDER BY read_count DESC, publish_time DESC LIMIT #{limit}
SELECT * FROM tb_news WHERE is_deleted = 0 ORDER BY publish_time DESC LIMIT #{limit}

SELECT * FROM tb_news WHERE is_deleted = 0 AND ( title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR author_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') ) ORDER BY publish_time DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{size}
